source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.
source_objects.title: Creativity

items.title: Woodworking Tools & Wood - Explained
items.headline: Tools, Sharpening, & Buying Wood, are all covered here.
objectives_summary: Tools, Timber and Sharpening 3-in-1
I explain all about the main tools you will need to complete most jobs, how to select timber and how sharpen woodworking tools.

items.title: 30 Art Therapy Exercises to Unwind and Explore Your Mind
items.headline: Healing through the visual arts
objectives_summary: Unwind and relax your mind through therapeutic art
Explore your feelings and emotions
Explore past events and unresolved incidents

items.title: What the heck is Bullet Journaling?
items.headline: After hours of staring at a screen, do you crave your creative side while still getting sh*t done?  Try journaling.
objectives_summary: Explain clearly what Bullet Journaling is and who created it.
Create a Bullet Journal.
Positive Journaling Habits.

items.title: Creativity Course by a Creativity Coach | Art & Innovation

visible_instructors.job_title: Creator of 'Learning English Path' / Identity Coach
visible_instructors.title: Gabriel Wallace
visible_instructors.name: Gabriel

items.headline: Creativity & Innovation for Innovators, Artists, Entrepreneurs, Writers, & Students - By a Professional Creativity Coach
objectives_summary: Rocket your creative thinking skills to a whole new level to create incredible innovations, art, designs, business ideas, or even your life!
Overcome procrastination, fear, blocks, limiting beliefs, resistance, doubts, and uncertainties to have creative breakthrough after breakthrough.
Live a life fueled by creative energy.

items.title: Creative Alcohol Ink Dragonfly Painting Steps Dots and Fun!
items.headline: Create a Whimsical Dragonfly painting on Yupo Paper. Get creative and have fun creating art using Alcohol Inks.
objectives_summary: Understand  how inks work and how to use them to create a whimsy Dragonfly painting.
Learn about Alcohol Ink and Yupo paper.
Make perfect circles/dots with Inks

items.title: The Disobedient Writer: Break the Rules and Free Your Story

visible_instructors.job_title: Award-Winning Author; Teacher of Fiction, Memoir, and Poetry
visible_instructors.title: Anya Achtenberg
visible_instructors.name: Anya

items.headline: A guide to taking your fiction writing and memoir writing beyond the same old formula and telling unforgettable stories
objectives_summary: Re-evaluate conventional rules and approaches and decide if they are right for you and your writing
Get un-stuck and generate lots of new writing with the help of the fertile writing explorations that accompany each unit
Discover alternative tools and approaches to expand your creative power and language, and ultimately help you discover the form of your story that gives it the space to fully develop

items.title: Sacred Geometry: Comprehensive Course
items.headline: You can draw in this class using a pencil, paper, compass, straightedge or using a free iOS app.
objectives_summary: Geometry skills
Understand the golden ratio
Feel the sacredness of pure geometry

items.title: Alcohol ink techniques and designs
items.headline: textures fine detailing and new blending techniques
objectives_summary: Learn new techniques to develop you alcohol ink art

items.title: Realistic Pastel Drawing for Beginners
items.headline: Recreating a Realistic Image from a Photograph
objectives_summary: You will come away from this class with your own beautiful interpretation of this image rendered in chalk pastel
You will also acquire the skills it takes to render this image including how to draw a simple, realistic object
How to mix colors in pastel

items.title: Realistic Charcoal Drawing for Beginners
items.headline: How to Recreate a Realistic Landscape in Charcoal from a Photograph
objectives_summary: You will come away from this class with your own beautiful interpretation of this image rendered in charcoal
You will also acquire the skills it takes to render this image including how to draw a simple, realistic landscape
How to layer and build values in charcoal

items.title: Beginner Alcohol Ink Yupo Sunset Learn to Paint Easy Steps
items.headline: Easy Steps to Paint and control Alcohol Inks. Create a stormy sunset painting on tile and Yupo Paper.
objectives_summary: Work quickly with Alcohol Inks using a wet in wet technique.
Play with the differences on tile vs Yupo paper.
Pour and blend colors wet in wet to create smooth backgrounds.

items.title: Screenwriting Masterclass: How to Write Fascinating Scenes

visible_instructors.job_title: Screenwriter, Script Doctor, Author and Speaker
visible_instructors.title: Karl Iglesias
visible_instructors.name: Karl

items.headline: Learn How to Write Scenes That Really Fascinate Your Audience. Improve your Screenwriting, Filmmaking & Storytelling!
objectives_summary: Instructor-led online course through Screenwriters University designed to improve your scene-writing skills
Put your scene writing skills to the test
Master the craft of scene writing and increase your chances of writing a successful script

items.title: How To Write A Novel For Beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: SEO Expert, Marketer, Author, and Teacher
visible_instructors.title: James Bruce
visible_instructors.name: James

items.headline: How To Write A Novel For Beginners : How To Write Novels In English: How To Write A Novel Outline : Start Writing A Book
objectives_summary: Understand how to write a novel outline
Understand and how to apply the story arc to write a novel
How to write a novel step by step with subplots and complex story arc

items.title: Storytelling: Engage Your Audience | Share Ideas Effectively
items.headline: Fundamentals of Storytelling | Writing Fiction to Non-Fiction | Story, Plot, Emotional Arc |Overcoming Writer's Block
objectives_summary: Story
Plot
3-Act-Structure

items.title: Create a Healing Spirit Art Doll
items.headline: Learn to create a Healing Spirit Doll & Ornaments using branches, sticks, recycled trinkets and eco-friendly paper clay.
objectives_summary: Create a healing spirit art doll with branches, sticks or BBQ skewers, recycled fabrics & treasures.
You will learn how to make doll faces, ornaments & jewelry from eco-friendly paper clay.
Ideas how to incorpotate eco-friendly recycled materials into your art doll.

items.title: How To Write Characters For  A Story : Creating Characters

visible_instructors.name: James

items.headline: Writing Fictional Characters: How To Write Characters For Books: Beginners Guide To Writing Characters For Fiction
objectives_summary: How to write a book and how to create vibrant characters
Writing a book with different types of characters
How to write a book of fiction with two and three dimensional characters
